data.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
data.author: Winston Churchill

data.quote: The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same.
data.author: Colin R. Davis

data.quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
data.author: Henry David Thoreau

data.quote: Opportunities don't happen. You create them.
data.author: Chris Grosser

data.quote: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
data.author: John D. Rockefeller

data.quote: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
data.author: Thomas Jefferson

data.quote: Success is not in what you have, but who you are.
data.author: Bo Bennett

data.quote: The secret of success is to do the common thing uncommonly well.
data.author: John D. Rockefeller Jr.

data.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
data.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

data.quote: Success is getting what you want. Happiness is wanting what you get.
data.author: Dale Carnegie

data.quote: Try not to become a man of success. Rather become a man of value.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: Success is not just about making money. It’s about making a difference.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
data.author: Robert Collier

data.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
data.author: Walt Disney

data.quote: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
data.author: Winston Churchill

data.quote: You know you are on the road to success if you would do your job and not be paid for it.
data.author: Oprah Winfrey

data.quote: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
data.author: Colin Powell

data.quote: Success is how high you bounce when you hit bottom.
data.author: George S. Patton

data.quote: Success is dependent on effort.
data.author: Sophocles

data.quote: To succeed in life, you need two things: ignorance and confidence.
data.author: Mark Twain
